DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate patient stable Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD ) efficacy statin ( simvastatin ) : ( 1 ) endothelial function ; ( 2 ) systemic inflammation ; ( 3 ) BODE ( B : body mass , O : bronchial obstruction , D : dyspnea , E : exercise tolerance ) index ; ( 4 ) Uric acid ; , ( 5 ) vascular growth factor . Design : 12 week randomize ( 1:1 ) , double-blind , placebo control study . Population : 18 male stable COPD 40-80 year age , exsmokers , Forced expiratory volume one second ( FEV1 ) 30 80 % predict post-bronchodilation .
